title: Patch (v5.1.1) Available Soon
preview: A patch (v5.1.1) will be available on 23/10/2025.
content:
A patch (v5.1.1) will be available on 23/10/2025.

We hope you continue enjoying eFootball™.

title: Known Issues
preview: See below for a list of issues recently confirmed by the de...
content:
See below for a list of issues recently confirmed by the development team.

We are working to resolve these issues as quickly as possible.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Issues Affecting eFootball™ League Rankings
preview: We have discovered that some users have experienced th...
content:
We have discovered that some users have experienced issues with their League Rankings not being updated correctly.

Our team is currently investigating this issue and working on a fix.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
